images.copyright: Hoarfrost and snow in the Cotswolds, England (© Peter Adams/Getty Images)
images.title: Cold falls on the Cotswolds
images.caption: Winter in England's Cotswolds
images.desc: The Cotswolds region is well known by Brits as a sleepy summer getaway, a day-trip destination for rambling through rolling pastures and charming villages while sampling delicious local produce. But in winter, this rural landscape takes on a new character when snows blanket the countryside.
